memories.content: Project: coolfollowers.com - Personal Instagram analytics dashboard for @anipottsbuilds. Tech stack: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4, shadcn/ui, Zod, Vercel Redis, Python serverless functions with Instaloader.
Deployment: GitHub repo https://github.com/anipotts/coolfollowers.com. Vercel at coolfollowerscom.vercel.app. Custom domain coolfollowers.com (sometimes unavailable, use Vercel URL as fallback).
Environment variables: SITE_PASSWORD (dashboard access), IG_USERNAME=anipottsbuilds, IG_SESSION_DATA (base64-encoded Instaloader session), REDIS_URL (from Vercel Redis integration).

Features implemented: Password-protected dashboard, live data refresh via /api/ig-refresh (Python), Redis caching with 1-hour TTL, posts with likers/comments, followers/following pages, timing analytics, hashtag performance.

Instagram session: Run 'instaloader --login=anipottsbuilds', complete 2FA if prompted, then base64-encode ~/.config/instaloader/session-anipottsbuilds. Sessions expire periodically and need regeneration.
Database: User has Vercel Redis (not Vercel KV). Python /api/ig-refresh.py uses standard redis library with redis.from_url(REDIS_URL). Requirements: instaloader==4.13.1, redis==5.0.1.

realtime_memories.content:
Your Instagram session needs to be regenerated. Run:

```bash
rm ~/.config/instaloader/session-anipottsbuilds
instaloader --login=anipottsbuilds
```

Complete 2FA if prompted, then:

```bash
base64 -i
